posts.message:
عندى سؤال كده:
كنت ببص فى linkedin على الstart-ups فالgame programming فى لندن. لقيت start-up فيه ناس كانت شغاله على العاب Call of duty و resident evil و super mario النسخه الجديده. 
السؤال بقه: الناس دى مش بتكمل فالشركات الى طلعت الجيمز الكبيره ليه ؟
اي الى يخليهم يروحه start-up ؟
وبرضه فى شركات الsoftware فيه ناس بتسيب الشركات الكبيره وبترجع تشتغل فى start-up
لماذا بقه ؟ :D

How do u deal with a perfectionist client? 

Someone who wants to overwrite everything's standard, and question everything to be customized.

for example why the navbar collapse with smaller sizes ? Why we can't get the small size menu without collapsing ? Things like that which would make the people who came up with responsive design wish if they didn't and suicide.

That's an example for what i go through, things like standards for example how col-md-4 align in smaller size he wants every single thing in bootstrap to be overwritten to achieve what he wants. Am i wrong or this is a crazy thing. Because what i know that those frameworks are made to give us easy and fast and good maintainable code !!!

For Front End Developers,

What are the best practices to test your code? Is it unit testing? end-to-end test or what? Is testing only applies to JavaScript code? Can you share your experiences with us?

هو الناس بتسخدم ايه دلوقتي علشان الauthentication في الAPIs؟ هل أستخدم موضوع إن لما الuser يبعتلي الusername و الpassword أديله session token و الsession details اللي هي mainly الuserId تبقى عندي في الdatabase؟ ولا أستخدم JWTs و أحط فيها الuserId مثلا و بكدة مش هحتاج أstore الsession details أصلا. ولا Oauth2 و في الحالة ديه هـhost الauthorization server جنب الserver بتاعي ولا ايه اللي بيحصل ؟ ولا كل ديه preferences مفيش أي مميزات لحاجة عن التانية ؟
